programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o wguide2.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
aout diskin2 "beats.wav", 1, 0, 1 ;in signal afreq1 line 100, p3, 2000 afreq2 line 1200, p3, p4 ;vary second frequency in the score kcutoff1 = 3000 kcutoff2 = 1500 kfeedback1 = 0.25 ;the sum of the two feedback kfeedback2 = 0.25 ;values should not exceed 0.5 asig wguide2 aout, afreq1, afreq2, kcutoff1, kcutoff2, kfeedback1, kfeedback2 asig dcblock2 asig ;get rid of DC outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> i 1 0 8 1200 ;freqency of afreq2 remains the same i 1 9 8 100 ;freqency of afreq2 gets lower e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
